name: Friendly Rumble
description:
Multiplayer Couch Casual/Competitive Game. Have multiple playable characters to choose from, consisting of lovable and cute characters. I made this game during pandemic lockdowns. All of my brothers help me in this game, formulate and design the idea of the game, modeling, animation, and coding.

This game has two game modes: Duel and Free For All.

Duel - Two Players only. Alternately select characters to counter and strategize your character pick.

Free For All - Up to Four Players. Each player select 1 character and the goal of the game is to be the last man standing.

Feel free to leave a comment or reaction to the game.

More Characters and Features are Incoming in next update.

Have Fun.
